tickets.title: Auth service returning 500 errors on login

conversation.author: Alice Chen
conversation.content: Hey, anyone else seeing 500s on the login page? Started about 10 min ago. Looks like auth-service is down. See AUTH-1234

conversation.author: Bob M
conversation.content: Yeah, confirming. Seeing it on the api-gateway too. Checking logs now.

conversation.author: Alice Chen
conversation.content: Login endpoint returns HTTP 500. Traced to auth-service failing to connect to user-db. Started at approximately 09:05 UTC.

conversation.author: Bob Martinez
conversation.content: Root cause: connection pool exhaustion on user-db. Scaled up the pool and restarted auth-service. Monitoring now.

conversation.author: Carol Wang
conversation.content: Confirmed stable for 4 hours. Adding alerting for connection pool usage on user-db.

conversation.author: Bob M
conversation.content: All clear now. Fixed in AUTH-1234. Added monitoring for the db pool.

tickets.title: Feature request: Add bulk export to CSV for reports

conversation.author: Diana Okafor
conversation.content: We need the ability to export report data as CSV in bulk. Currently we can only export one report at a time which is very slow for our analytics team. This is a feature request for the reporting-service.

conversation.author: Eve Thompson
conversation.content: This would be a great enhancement. We should also consider adding it to the export-api so third party integrations can use it. Adding to the roadmap for Q2.

tickets.title: How do I reset my 2FA? Can't find the option in settings

conversation.author: Frank Kim
conversation.content: Help me please — how do I reset my 2FA? I got a new phone and can't find where to reset it in the settings page.

conversation.author: Alice Chen
conversation.content: Go to Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication > Reset. There's a documentation page here: https://docs.company.com/2fa-reset

conversation.author: Frank Kim
conversation.content: Found it, thanks! The option was hidden under the advanced section. Maybe we could make it more visible?

tickets.title: Billing discrepancy: customer charged twice for subscription

conversation.author: Grace L
conversation.content: Customer Acme Corp was charged twice for their monthly subscription. See BILL-9012. This is wrong team — should go to billing team, not platform.

conversation.author: Grace Liu
conversation.content: Double charge detected for customer ID 78901. The billing-service processed two payment events for the same invoice. Possibly a race condition in the payment-worker.

conversation.author: Bob Martinez
conversation.content: Reassigning to billing team. This is a known issue with the payment-worker idempotency. Not a platform bug.

conversation.author: Henry Park
conversation.content: Refund processed for Acme Corp. We need to fix the idempotency key generation in payment-worker. Tracking in BILL-9012.

tickets.title: Search indexer crashing with OOM on large tenants

conversation.author: Bob M
conversation.content: The search-service indexer is crashing with OOM errors for tenants with >1M documents. search-service pod keeps getting killed. PLAT-9999

conversation.author: Bob Martinez
conversation.content: search-service indexer OOM on large tenants. Stack trace shows unbounded batch size in the indexer-worker. Need to implement pagination for the index-api.

conversation.author: Carol Wang
conversation.content: Confirmed the issue. The indexer-worker loads the entire document set into memory. Implementing chunked processing with 10k doc batches.

conversation.author: Carol W
conversation.content: PR up for the chunked indexer. Also adding memory limits to the search-service deployment.

conversation.author: Diana Okafor
conversation.content: Tested with our largest tenant (2.3M docs). Indexing completes successfully with peak memory under 2GB. Bug is fixed.
